text: Bonnie Bedelia Culkin, better known as Bonnie Bedelia (born March 25, 1948 in New York City), is an American actress. She is best known for starring as Holly Gennero in the first two Die Hard movies. She has acted in other movies as well. She is the aunt of Home Alone actor Macaulay Culkin. == References == ==Other websites== * * * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Bonnie Bedelia
